name: You Never Existed for Billions of Years Before You Were Born
name_original: You Never Existed for Billions of Years Before You Were Born
description:
*:･ﾟ✧

I like to sit on this train just to watch the city go by sometimes.

 *:･ﾟ✧

Sometimes it's nice to just get on a train without any real direction.

 *:･ﾟ✧
